scenarios.title: Nigerian Woman
scenarios.text: A black woman in Nigeria bleaching her skin.

scenarios.title: Gay Man
scenarios.text: A gay man in the United States going through reparative or conversion therapy to cure himself of homosexuality.

scenarios.title: Korean Woman
scenarios.text: A Korean woman getting surgery so that she can have a "fold" on her eyelids and be more attractive.

scenarios.title: Special needs
scenarios.text: A young man with autism who refuses to be friends with other people with special needs, because he thinks this idea is "retarded."

scenarios.title: Alaska Native
scenarios.text: An Alaska Native woman who looks down on other Native people from the "village" and teases them for their "village accent."

scenarios.title: Fillipino Man
scenarios.text: A man in the Philippines spending his hard-earned money to pay for treatments in a local skin-whitening clinic.

scenarios.title: UK mother
scenarios.text: A mother in the United Kingdom who, while playing catch with her daughter, coaches her to "don't throw like a girl."

scenarios.title: Mexican adolescent
scenarios.text: A Mexican American adolescent who is embarrassed of his parents as they struggled to talk with his teacher in their limited, broken, and accented English.
